news.title: Listen to Idles’ New Song for Darren Aronofsky’s Caught Stealing Movie
news.summary: The British band recorded “Rabbit Run” and three other tracks for the new film starring Austin Butler, Bad Bunny, Zoë Kravitz, Action Bronson, and others

news.title: The Antlers Announce New Album Blight, Share New Song: Listen
news.summary: Murder ballad “Carnage” leads the indie-rock band’s first full-length in four years

news.title: Yves Tumor and Bar Italia’s Nina Cristante Share Video for New Song “We Dont Count”: Watch
news.summary: The experimental artists self-shot the black-and-white visual

news.title: Stephen O’Malley, Oren Ambarchi, and More Help Make New Virtual Guitar
news.summary: Several leading avant-garde guitarists, also including David Torn and Bill Horist, collaborated with Randall Dunn to design sounds for the new “Ruins” software instrument from Slate + Ash
